languages.text: "Какая неожиданность, ты сведущ в искусстве подлого убийства. Частенько в своей жизни пользовался оружием трусов вместо того, чтобы биться честно?"
"What a surprise, you are versed in the art of underhanded murder. Have you often resorted to the coward's weapon in your life, rather than fighting fair?"
languages.original_text: "Какая неожиданность, ты сведущ в искусстве подлого убийства. Частенько в своей жизни пользовался оружием трусов вместо того, чтобы биться честно?"

traits.locale_text: "What a surprise, you are versed in the art of underhanded murder. Have you often resorted to the coward's weapon in your life, rather than fighting fair?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What a surprise, you are versed in the art of underhanded murder. Have you often resorted to the coward's weapon in your life, rather than fighting fair?"

traits.locale_text: "What a surprise, you are versed in the art of underhanded murder. Have you often resorted to the coward's weapon in your life, rather than fighting fair?"

traits.locale_text: "What a surprise, you are versed in the art of underhanded murder. Have you often resorted to the coward's weapon in your life, rather than fighting fair?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「こいつは驚いた、お前は暗殺技術に精通してるんだな。正々堂々戦うよりも、卑怯な武器に頼る方が多いのか？」
languages.original_text: "What a surprise, you are versed in the art of underhanded murder. Have you often resorted to the coward's weapon in your life, rather than fighting fair?"

traits.locale_text: 「こいつは驚いた、お前は暗殺技術に精通してるんだな。正々堂々戦うよりも、卑怯な武器に頼る方が多いのか？」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “真没想到，原来你还挺擅长偷偷摸摸地把别人弄死。你这辈子是不是经常使用这种懦夫的伎俩，不愿意进行公平的对决？”
languages.original_text: "What a surprise, you are versed in the art of underhanded murder. Have you often resorted to the coward's weapon in your life, rather than fighting fair?"

traits.locale_text: “真没想到，原来你还挺擅长偷偷摸摸地把别人弄死。你这辈子是不是经常使用这种懦夫的伎俩，不愿意进行公平的对决？”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Quelle surprise, vous êtes versé dans l'art du meurtre sournois. Avez-vous souvent opté pour l'arme du lâche, plutôt que de combattre à la loyale ? »
languages.original_text: "What a surprise, you are versed in the art of underhanded murder. Have you often resorted to the coward's weapon in your life, rather than fighting fair?"

traits.locale_text: « Quelle surprise, vous êtes versé dans l'art du meurtre sournois. Avez-vous souvent opté pour l'arme du lâche, plutôt que de combattre à la loyale ? »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Menuda sorpresa, domina usted el arte del asesinato furtivo. ¿Suele hacer uso de esta táctica artera en lugar de advocar por una refriega justa?».
languages.original_text: "What a surprise, you are versed in the art of underhanded murder. Have you often resorted to the coward's weapon in your life, rather than fighting fair?"

traits.locale_text: «Menuda sorpresa, domina usted el arte del asesinato furtivo. ¿Suele hacer uso de esta táctica artera en lugar de advocar por una refriega justa?».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Was für eine Überraschung. Ihr seid in der Kunst des hinterhältigen Mordes bewandert. Habt Ihr in Eurem Leben oft die Waffe eines Feiglings verwendet, anstatt fair zu kämpfen?"
languages.original_text: "What a surprise, you are versed in the art of underhanded murder. Have you often resorted to the coward's weapon in your life, rather than fighting fair?"

traits.locale_text: "Was für eine Überraschung. Ihr seid in der Kunst des hinterhältigen Mordes bewandert. Habt Ihr in Eurem Leben oft die Waffe eines Feiglings verwendet, anstatt fair zu kämpfen?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Bak hele, saman altından adam öldürmekte pek bilgi sahibisin. Ömründe adil savaşmaktansa bu adi yönteme çok başvurdun herhâlde."
languages.original_text: "What a surprise, you are versed in the art of underhanded murder. Have you often resorted to the coward's weapon in your life, rather than fighting fair?"

traits.locale_text: "Bak hele, saman altından adam öldürme işinde epey bilgiliymişsin. Ömründe adil savaşmaktansa bu adi yönteme çok başvurdun herhâlde."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
